value.fullName: 2 = missing 1 or more of 3 major sales components
value.label: 2 = missing 1 or more of 3 major sales components

value.fullName: 4 = contains operational/transitional/ & mutually agreed to financial steps
value.label: 4 = contains operational/transitional/ & mutually agreed to financial steps

value.fullName: 5 = contains all 3 major components, mutually agree to and all buying processes are represented (eg. Legal, technical, admin, etc)
